name: Natalia Garcia
summary: Versatile and solutions-driven professional with strong background in strategic planning, sales management, general business administration, CRM, HR, and operations planning. Proficient at identifying cost-effective strategies to promote savings and able to define, develop and implement action plans and policies to maximize productivity and efficiency.

experience.title: Assistant to Managing Director
experience.description: Provided dedicated support to the Managing Director and other executives; conducted research; issued corporate presentations; arranged meetings and travel; managed phone calls and calendar; liaised with vendors and contractors; prepared requisition purchases and filing; produced reports and weekly/monthly presentations; improved overall quality and efficiency; reconciled vendor invoices.

experience.title: Business Manager
experience.description: Organized and supervised central services (reception, security, maintenance, mail) and day-to-day office operations; ensured contracts, insurance requirements and safety standards compliance; managed 10 staff; developed and updated customer database; implemented cash loss prevention and security policies; analyzed sales figures and forecasted volumes; participated in recruitment and staff development; produced performance reports and supported budgeting and cost estimates; liaised with authorities and expanded relationships.

experience.title: Travel Consultant
experience.description: Key person after office Director; travel market knowledge and management of booking systems (Global Amadeus, Sire); managed intranet and accounting system; planning, organization and sale of travels, packages, plane tickets and events; established a new department to service European tour operators with Spain-related services.

education.degree: Masters in Digital Marketing and 2.0 Communications
education.school: ENyD Business School & Universidad Europea Miguel de Cervantes

education.degree: Bachelors of Arts: Tourism Business Management
